mentionedBy.name: Toast
mentionedBy.notes: Cloud-based restaurant iPad POS system with comprehensive features and robust third-party integrations. Designed for fine dining, franchises, and large restaurant groups. Higher cost alternative to Toast with powerful back-end features for inventory and multi-location management.
